name: Hytale Server (Refined)
author: admin@micheal.cc
description: Hytale Dedicated Server configured according to the official Hypixel Studios manual. Requires Java 25.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Hytale Server Installation Script

apt update
apt install -y curl unzip

# 1. Download the file (Defaults to Hytale URL via Variable)
echo "Downloading server from ${DOWNLOAD_URL}..."
curl -L "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" -o hytale-downloader.zip

# 2. Unzip and overwrite existing files
echo "Unpacking server files..."
unzip -o hytale-downloader.zip

# 3. Cleanup
rm hytale-downloader.zip

echo "Installation complete."

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the main server jar file.

variables.name: Download URL
variables.description: URL to download the server zip.

variables.name: Override Session Token
variables.description: Optional: For Server Providers using the API auth flow.

variables.name: Override Identity Token
variables.description: Optional: For Server Providers using the API auth flow.
